docs.snippet: Some of the most popular albums of rock’s golden age were produced at the studio on West 53rd Street, but any developer who bought it would almost certainly replace the recording equipment with apartments....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of the most popular albums of rock’s golden age were produced at the studio on West 53rd Street, but any developer who bought it would almost certainly replace the recording equipment with apartments.
docs.abstract: The Appraisal column; building on Manhattan's west side that once housed legendary Power Station recording studio, later rechristened Avatar Studios, is being sold by owners Chieko and Kirk Imamura; couple insists they are entertaining offers only from people in music industry, though changes in industry and real estate market raise likelihood building will be converted into condos.

headline.main: The Music May Stop at a Storied Manhattan Studio
headline.print_headline: The Music May Stop at a Storied Studio

docs.snippet: LOS ANGELES - It's official: James Cameron is going back to Pandora not just for his next film, but also for his next two. Mr. Cameron, the filmmaker behind the 3-D blockbuster ''Avatar,'' joined 20th Century Fox in announcing that he would make '...
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES - It's official: James Cameron is going back to Pandora not just for his next film, but also for his next two. Mr. Cameron, the filmmaker behind the 3-D blockbuster ''Avatar,'' joined 20th Century Fox in announcing that he would make ''Avatar 2'' and ''Avatar 3'' as his next two movies, with the first of the sequels scheduled for release in December 2014, and the second for December of the following year. That assures a lot of fantasy-filled Decembers, as Peter Jackson has already scheduled a pair of ''Hobbit'' films for Warner Brothers and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in that month in the years 2012 and 2013. ''Avatar'' was released on Dec. 18 of last year and became the highest-grossing film in history, with almost $2.8 billion in worldwide ticket sales. Mr. Cameron and the top Fox film executives, Jim Gianopulos and Tom Rothman, jointly said they aimed to begin production next year on the first sequel. The film is not yet officially titled, they said. This is a more complete version of the story than the one that appeared in print.
docs.abstract: Avatar filmmaker James Cameron confirms plans with 20th Century Fox to make Avatar 2 and Avatar 3, for successive December releases in 2014 and 2015 (S)

docs.snippet: Want to learn how to put an end to junk E-mail forever? Don't ask Avatar Publishing -- even though a piece of widely circulated promotional  electronic mail from Avatar has been luring readers with the subject line: ''Never Receive Junk E-Mail Aga...
docs.lead_paragraph: Want to learn how to put an end to junk E-mail forever? Don't ask Avatar Publishing -- even though a piece of widely circulated promotional electronic mail from Avatar has been luring readers with the subject line: ''Never Receive Junk E-Mail Again!'' ''Wouldn't it be great to never get junk E-mail again?'' the message begins. ''Well, no one can make you that promise, unfortunately. But you can profit from junk E-mail.''
docs.abstract: Avatar Publishing is using electronic mail to promote kit on how to profit from junk e-mail; lures readers with opening line that seems to promise way to avoid getting junk e-mail; drawing (S)

headline.main: Compressed Data; The Fine Art Of Luring Readers

docs.snippet: James Cameron did not get his chance to save the world from a rogue oil well, but it is beginning to look as though he rescued Hollywood's box office ecosystem from total disaster this year.     Mr. Cameron's ''Avatar,'' the 3-D science fiction ep...
docs.lead_paragraph: James Cameron did not get his chance to save the world from a rogue oil well, but it is beginning to look as though he rescued Hollywood's box office ecosystem from total disaster this year. Mr. Cameron's ''Avatar,'' the 3-D science fiction epic released by 20th Century Fox in December 2009, has remained the biggest event of 2010, having taken in more than $465 million of its $749 million domestic box office this year, according to Hollywood.com's box office service.
docs.abstract: Media Decoder blog reports James Cameron's Avatar, released by 20th Century Fox in December 2009, has remained biggest event of 2010, having taken in more than $465 million of its $749 million domestic box office (M)

headline.main: At Box Office, 'Avatar' Cast As Savior

docs.snippet: James Cameron and 20th Century Fox said they expected to begin production next year and release the first of three additional films in December 2017....
docs.lead_paragraph: James Cameron and 20th Century Fox said they expected to begin production next year and release the first of three additional films in December 2017.
docs.abstract: James Cameron and 20th Century Fox say that they now expect to make three rather than two sequels to their hit film Avatar; will begin production in 2014 and release first of three films in December 2017.
